background: A company is looking to minimize the total transportation cost of transporting goods from its depots to ports.
constraints: The number of depots I is non-negative
The number of ports J is non-negative
Cost per unit distance Price is non-negative
Distance between each depot i and port j is non-negative
objective: Minimize the total transportation cost from depots to ports
description: Minimize the total transportation cost. This cost is calculated based on the number of depots \param{I}, the number of ports \param{J}, the cost \param{Price} per unit distance for transporting goods, and the distance \param{Distance} between depot i and port j.

parameters.definition: Cost per unit distance for transporting goods
Distance between depot i and port j
